text: 5.18 Luk 16.17, 21.33 Yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin, Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak ma kul gɨnɨgab, mɨd dad amɨl, wɨsɨp adekab alaŋ sek, lum awl sek pɨsnep kul gɨnɨgab ñɨn ak agak. Ñu kɨl awl okok abe sɨkol okok abe, ma kul gɨnɨgab agak. Takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl yenɨgab, mɨd dad amɨl, tap gɨnɨgab anɨb okok mɨdupsek gɨnɨgab agak.
